title: random fps drop
body: starting 2 weeks ago i have been recieving a huge fps drop that is making the game unplayable i have tried to put a cap on the fps i've also tried to fix it by turning off my firewall repairing the client all with no luck. im linked directly to my router just like my roommate and he is not experiencing this problem i need more ideas some kind of help please.

replies.body: Is it random stuttering? Or is it constant?

Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.


http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg

Great advice here, the FPS guide will resolve a lot of causes to FPS issues. Should the guide not resolve the issue, I recommend creating a set of [Hextech Repair Logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our tech specialists.

They'll be able to take the data in those logs and work with you to resolve this for good.
